backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Cancellation of Public Meeting - City-initiated Zoning By-law Amendments to Update Definitions and Standards for Multi-tenant Houses

noticeDescription:
CANCELLATION NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING

 

Location of Proposal: City-wide

 

City-initiated Zoning By-law Amendments to Update Definitions

and Standards for Multi-tenant Houses

Proponent: City of Toronto

 

A Notice of Public Meeting was originally issued on October 2, 2025.  Please be advised that the Public Meeting for this proposal previously scheduled for October 30, 2025, has been CANCELLED.

 

Compliance with Provincial laws respecting Notice may result in you receiving duplicate notices.
title: Notice of Cancellation of Public Meeting - City-initiated Zoning By-law Amendments to Update Definitions and Standards for Multi-tenant Houses
topics: Planning > Refusal of application for a Zoning By-law Amendment
